author: Staff Reporter
text:
The deserted branch of a nationalised bank in Puducherry on Friday.— Photo: S.S. Kumar

Banking operations in Puducherry were affected as employees of Public Sector Banks participated in the one-day nation wide strike to protest against the violation of the bilateral settlement by five associate banks of the State Bank of India (SBI).

As many as 105 public sector banks participated in the strike called by the All India Bank Employees Association (AIBEA).

The strike was total and banking transactions worth Rs. 100 crore were affected in Puducherry, a spokesperson of the association in Puducherry said. ATMs too ran dry in most of the areas in the city due to panic withdrawals.
title: Bank strike total in UT
